name: Age of Arcana 🧙‍♂️
description:
Age of Arcana is a 2D management game set in a fantasy world revolving around the arrival of Magic. Manage the different factions as they learn to deal with Magic. 

This project is currently on hold. I decided to share it nonetheless, because I spent an important amount of time working on this, and I would love to share it with you ! Feel free to give me your opinion ! 

PS : While it's completely fine to play it for free, any contribution is highly appreciated, and will help me continue my work.
